DOC.brief_summary: Measurement of bone density of Cystic Fibrosis patients with two techniques and correlation to serum bone parameters, use of steroids, lung function and nutritional status.
DOC.brief_title: Can Quantitative Ultrasound be Used for the Evaluation of Bone Health in Adolescents and Adults With Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: Measurement of bone density of Cystic Fibrosis patients with two techniques and correlation to serum bone parameters, use of steroids, lung function and nutritional status.
